TopicTitle: Controls forgotten whenever Kerbal started without joystick

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0 Windows 64-bit [Remember to include the operating system, and 32 or 64 bit.]

What Happens: Kerbal forgets my joystick configuration settings for all axis except pitch

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

1) Start kerbal with a joystick

2) Setup all controls

3) Quit Kerbal

4) Unplug Joystick

5) Start Kerbal without Joystick

6) Fly a craft.

7) Plugin Joystick. 

8) Notice controls don't work

9) Go to settings menu, notice all joystick axis unbound except pitch axis

Regression from .90. In .90, it would remember my joystick settings, so I could plug in the joystick later (even during flight!) and it would immediately work. I game on a laptop, so it's not feasible to have my joystick plugged in all the time, and I constantly have to re-setup my control settings when I forget and start Kerbal first.

Joystick: T-flight Hotas X.

Fixes/Workarounds:

Don't unplug the joystick
